Christiano-Fitzgerald Filter

Source: R/07-filter.R
filter_cf.Rd

This function computes the cyclical component of the Christiano-Fitzgerald filter.

filter_cf(x, ...)

Arguments

x

[univariate vector]

Univariate vector, numeric or ts object with only one dimension.
...

Further arguments passed to cffilter.

Examples

# \donttest{
x <- cumsum(rnorm(100))
filter_cf(x)

#>   [1]  0.200411036  0.830342788  0.092543419  0.423974328  0.050369682
#>   [6] -0.193616049 -0.660532763 -0.971389949  0.797128840  0.600256685
